inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: detrending
parameters.description: Type of detrending: 'standard', 'robust', or 'none'

parameters.name: registration
parameters.description: Quality of registration: 'high', 'medium', 'low' or 'none'

parameters.name: registration_restrict
parameters.description: Restrict registration (e.g. 1x1x1x1x1x1x0x0x0x1x1x0)

parameters.name: diam_cell
parameters.description: Cell diameter in microns

parameters.name: ds
parameters.description: Spatial coarse-graining in x-y dimension

parameters.name: planes_pad
parameters.description: Number of planes to pad the volume with for robust registration

parameters.name: planes_packed
parameters.description: Packed planes in each volume (for single plane imaging with packed planes)

parameters.name: parallel_clean
parameters.description: Parallelization of final cleaning (True is fast but memory intensive)

parameters.name: parallel_volume
parameters.description: Parallelization of mean-volume computation (True is fast but memory intensive)

parameters.name: save_volume
parameters.description: Save registered volumes after segmentation (True keeps a copy of the volumes)

parameters.name: type_timepoints
parameters.description: Type of timepoints to use for cell detection: 'dff', 'periodic' or 'custom'

parameters.name: type_mask
parameters.description: Type of volume averaging for mask: 'mean', 'geomean' or 'max'

parameters.name: timepoints
parameters.description: Number ('dff', 'periodic') or vector ('custom') of timepoints for segmentation

parameters.name: f_hipass
parameters.description: Frequency (Hz) for high-pass filtering of cell timeseries

parameters.name: f_volume
parameters.description: Imaging frequency in Hz

parameters.name: n_cells_block
parameters.description: Number of cells in a block. Small number is fast but can lead to blocky output

parameters.name: n_colors
parameters.description: Number of brain colors (2 in two-color volumes)

parameters.name: res_x
parameters.description: X resolution in microns

parameters.name: res_y
parameters.description: Y resolution in microns

parameters.name: res_z
parameters.description: Z resolution in microns

parameters.name: t_baseline
parameters.description: Interval for baseline calculation in seconds

parameters.name: t_section
parameters.description: Exposure time in seconds for slice acquisition

parameters.name: thr_mask
parameters.description: Threshold for volume mask: 0 < thr <= 1 (probability) or thr > 1 (intensity)

parameters.name: ext
parameters.description: File extension

parameters.name: dim_order
parameters.description: Dimensions order. Examples: 'zyx', 'xyz'

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Remote file

parameters.name: output_to_nwb
parameters.description: Save results to a new NWB file
